content: why settle for a plain hat when you can rock the streets with a whimsical blend of warmth and whimsy picture this a beanie that not only keeps you snug in the chill but also turns heads with its adorable cat ears perched on top it s not just a hat it s a style statement a conversation starter and a beacon of fun in a sea of mundane winter accessories grab your knitting needles and let your creativity run wild as you whip up a cat-tastic masterpiece that reflects your playful spirit whether you re a cat enthusiast a trendsetter or someone who simply appreciates the joy of handmade fashion our knitted cat ear beanie is the purr-fect project for you yarn 1 skein of lion brand heartland thick and quick in the color black canyon 153 bulky/chunky/12-ply yarn- 125yd/142g/114m needles 8 mm us 11 knitting needles skills skill level - basic beginner this is a basic knitting pattern for beginners it uses basic knitting stitches knit and purl to create ribbing and stockinette stitches sizing 2t - 4t - co 24 / circumference = 18-21 / finished length = 16 5t to 12 years - co 26 / circumference = 19-22 /finished length = 18 teens to adults - co 28 / circumference = 20-23 / finished length = 20 large adult - co 30 / circumference = 22-25 / finished length = 22 copyright please do not copy sell redistribute or republish this pattern if you wish to share this pattern link to the pattern page only you may sell items produced using this pattern do not use the copyrighted photos for your product listing for the copyright t&c please read my terms of use
